txt.en: Go with the disguised Ayorzén to Barad Cúron, pretending to be his prisoner
Enter Barad Cúron and confront Gothmog
Gothmog stumbles in pain, cursing his mortality
Culang has succumbed to his wounds!
Defeat the illusions of Mordirith
Ayorzén has disguised himself as Karazgar, the Weeping Warrior, and plans to bring you inside Barad Cúron as his prisoner.
Ayorzén has disguised himself as Karazgar, the Weeping Warrior, and now he attempts to bring you and the Ranger Culang into Barad Cúron as his prisoners.
The watchful presence that guards the entrance to Barad Cúron has given you leave to enter the tower.
'I hope you are ready for this, [placeholder]. Remember what I said! I will not die for you!'
'Step into the light, my guests. I would see you more clearly.'
DNT - Blah!
'Only together can we defeat the will of Sauron!'
'Ah... I did not expect you to be so bold.'
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
'Are you so eager to die?'
DNT - Blah!
'Does anyone else desire to flee?'

Culang believes you should use Gothmog's own weapons against him, reminding the wraith of those heroes who stood against darkness despite the evils arrayed against them. It is Culang's hope that the light of their inspiration will serve to weaken the wraith, sapping him of his strength.
'Are you not? Foolish Ranger.'
'This one knows what to fear.'
'She was the Deception.'
'Her weapon was trickery, and it cut deep!'
DNT - Blah!
'Your allies were not strong enough.'
'This has been a most entertaining diversion... but now it ends.'
'Who do you say you are?'
'No! Noooooo!'
'None but Gúrzyul may pass.'
'Now you will die!'
'I do not know this Ranger, but [placeholder] has long been Gothmog's foe.'
'He awaits you. You and your prisoners may pass... Karazgar.'
Inside Barad Cúron, the wraith Gothmog attempts to demoralize you with painful memories of the past.
'We're going, we're going.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Culang must survive</rgb>
Inside Barad Cúron, the wraith Gothmog attempts to demoralize you with painful memories of the past.
'I am not!'
'I will leave you to your fun, Gothmog!'
'Their vulnerabilities were... easily exploited.'
Gothmog has not yet exhausted his powers. With his illusions defeated he redoubles his attack!
'We are not afraid of you, wraith!'
'The Weakness lay deep, and festered.'
'Every triumph inspires us, Gothmog!'
'But the seed of your defeat was sown in cruelty, and could not be overcome.'
'Every illusion we dispel makes us stronger!'
'Thus was born the Failure.'
'Your illusions are no match for us, Gothmog!'
'I am Amarthiel no longer! I am Narmeleth, as my father named me!'
'You celebrate too soon, Ranger.'
'We won! Gothmog is no more!'
'Deception, Weakness, and Failure cannot be bested so easily!'
'We must weaken him somehow!'
'Die, then, by my hand!'
'We must draw upon his past defeats! Remind him of his losses!'
Both weakened and enraged by your defiance, Gothmog presses the attack!
'It is working!'
'Sauron shall atone for the evil he has done to our people!'
Inside Barad Cúron, the Tower of the Crescent Moon, the villain Gothmog awaits.
Watchful Presence
'Move it, worms!'
'I have brought these prisoners for Gothmog's entertainment.'
'You do not know Karazgar the Mighty?'
'I am the terror of East and North!'
Mocking laughter echoes around the throne room
'If you bar the way of Karazgar, you will not escape punishment!'
'Move it, slime!'
Defeat the illusions of Mordirith
'The works of Sauron cannot last forever! Always we will oppose them!'
'I am satisfied! Let my death see Mordirith defeated!'
Survive the further assaults of Gothmog
Draw upon the memory of Narmeleth for inspiration
Draw upon the memory of Golodir for inspiration
Draw upon the memory of Isildur for inspiration
Draw upon the memory of Anárion for inspiration
Draw upon the memory of Elendil for inspiration
Defeat Gothmog
Instance: Gothmog's Rage
Talk to Ayorzén outside Barad Cúron
